00034     class texture
00035     {
00036         friend class sprite;
00037         
00038     protected:
00042         void init_texture(const unsigned char* data, int sz);
00043         
00044     private:
00045         GLuint              name_;
00046         size                size_;

00048         GLfloat             max_s_, max_t_;

00050     public:
00054         texture()
00055         : name_(0)
00056         , size_(0,0)
00057         , width_(0)
00058         , height_(0)
00059         , max_s_(0)
00060         , max_t_(0)
00061         {
00062         }
00063         
00067         texture(ifdstream stream);
00068         
00069         ~texture();
00070         
00071         virtual inline size size() const { return size_; }
00072         
00073         virtual void draw_in_rect(rect box) const;
00074         virtual void draw_at_point(point pos) const;
00075     };
